author: Special Correspondent
text:
Wing Commander Paramvir Singh was recently honoured with a certificate of appreciation by Lt. Gen S.K. Gadeock, AVSM, Commandant of the Defence Services Staff College (DSSC), Wellington, Nilgiris and Vijaya Dar, President Rotary Club of the Nilgiris, Coonoor.

It must be recollected that on Air Force Day 2015, Wing Commander Paramvir Singh along with Sergeant Gullupillli Narahari and Sergeant Saripilli Srihari set off on a swim in the Ganga, covering 2,800 km from Devprayag to Gangasagar.
title: Wing Commander honoured
